nodes.documentation:
Constructs the contract and sets the contract owner address 
to the main wallet that will operate it.
nodes.name: Supplier

nodes.documentation:
Modifier to validate if the sender is the owner and can
change the ballance of the consumer contract.
nodes.name: _canChangeBallance

nodes.documentation:
Modifier to validate if the sender is the owner and can
add the consumer contract to the mapping.
nodes.name: _canAddConsumer

nodes.documentation:
Modifier to validate if the sender is the owner and can
set the storage level.
nodes.name: _canSetStorageLevel

nodes.documentation:
Modifier to validate if the sender is the owner and can
set the windmill status.
nodes.name: _canSetWindmillStatus

nodes.documentation:
Modifier to validate if the sender is the owner and can 
set the reading of the windmill.
nodes.name: _canIncrementGeneratedPower

nodes.documentation: Adds a consumer to this supplier contract.
nodes.name: addConsumer

nodes.documentation:
Tops up razors to the consumer ballance and removes from the 
current razors asset.
nodes.name: topUpConsumer

nodes.documentation: Gets the consumer razor balance based on its address
nodes.name: getConsumerBalance

nodes.documentation: Debits razors from the consumer ballance
nodes.name: debitFromConsumer

nodes.documentation:
Sets the current storage level in kwh. It's supposed to set the pre-calculated
ammount of energy being provided by the storage.
nodes.name: setStorageLevel

nodes.documentation: Reads the last storage level in kwh.
nodes.name: getStorageLevel

nodes.documentation: Reads the last storage level timestamp.
nodes.name: getLastStorageLevelTimestamp

nodes.documentation: Increments the total accumulated power.
nodes.name: incrementGeneratedPower

nodes.documentation: Gets the total acumulated power generated by the windmill.
nodes.name: getAccumulatedGeneratedPower

nodes.documentation: Gets the total acumulated razors generated by the windmill.
nodes.name: getAccumulatedGeneratedRazors

nodes.documentation: Gets the total razor generated by the windmill.
nodes.name: getCurrentRazorBallance

nodes.documentation: Sets the Windmill status.
nodes.name: setWindmillStatus

nodes.documentation: Gets the windmilll last status.
nodes.name: getWindmillStatus
